Related repos

  • Electron app for running YouTube Music on desktop with plugin support
  • Downloads videos and playlists from YouTube
  • Streams music from YouTube with background playback and caching
  • Enables YouTube for TV in a browser
  • Streams videos without ads or recommendations
  • Music player with YouTube streaming and synced lyrics
  • Library for querying YouTube metadata, video streams, and captions
